pages.text: An advanced, experimental variant of the $(l:crafting/fey_crafter)fey crafter$() with no interface. The output is right-clicked onto the crafter to set the recipe or remove it.$(br2)$(info) If it is a valid recipe output, items will be drawn from an inventory below to fill its input slots.$(br2)Begin crafting by right-clicking with a $(l:crafting/knives)knife$(), either by hand or dispenser.
$(info) This crafter obeys the $(l:crafting/fey_crafter)fey crafter's$() grove stones limits.

pages.name: Chest Location
pages.text: The feeder chest must be below the crafter. Torch locations indicate eligible output inventory spots.

pages.title: Automation
pages.text: $(warning) Unlike the $(l:crafting/fey_crafter)fey crafter$(), only a single craft of a recipe will be made upon activation.$(br2)With valid ingredients, particles will flow up from the pedestal, and a comparator will show an output of 15 (otherwise 0).$(br2)The result will be ejected nearby or placed into an inventory in one of the eligible locations shown.
